Reading this, it makes a lot more sense. I always sensed a kind of tension with mignola on the movies.
"Del Toro didnt think twice about making all those changes to the character for the film. It was only when the film was about to come out that he started saying, Gee, I wonder if the fans will lynch us. And I said, I just hope they dont lynch me before I can point them in your direction, because that shit wasnt my idea."
I still think he should have gave GDT and Ron a shout out, but I understand why he wasnt totally on board for the third hellboy from gdt
